author: duftler
msg: Cleaned up the way the propagation of the Servlet ClassLoader works a bit.
- Added a utility method to load a class using the Servlet's ClassLoader.
Made changes so that the code interpreting the deployment descriptor uses
the same mechanism to ensure the correct ClassLoader is being used.
